page.title: 09FAIRLAWNS NURSING HOME
page.content: FAIRLAWNS IS A NURSING HOME WHICH ABIDES BY THE LAWS MADE BY THE DISTRICT HEALTH AUTHORITY.ONCE A YEAR THE HOME IS INSPECTED BY VARIOUS AUTHORITIES. THE ROOMS ARE A CERTAIN SIZE AND HAVE WASH-BASINS AND CALL-BELLS. FAIRLAWNS EMPLOYS 32 STAFF INCLUDING 2 PROFESSIONAL NURSES. ALTOGETHER THERE ARE 29 PATIENTS,AND THE AVARAGE AGE IS 70(ABOUT). THERE ARE NO ORGANISED OUTINGS BECAUSE MOST OF THE PATIENTS ARE TOO SICK BUT THE ONES WHO ARE FIT CAN GO OUT. FAIRLAWNS ADVERTISE IN THE YELLOW PAGES AND THE LOCAL PRESS NO PETS ARE ALLOWED,BUT THE HOME OWNS A CAT AND A BUDGERIE-GAR.
